title: New: Châteaux – It's Magic
body:
Only days after originally posting about **Châteaux**, this Manchester based outfit have returned with a new track entitled ‘**It’s Magic**‘.

Available for free download, ‘**It’s Magic**‘ presents the listener with another aspect to the band’s reverb infused lo-fi pop sound, as the track fluctuates raucously in tempo and ultimately concludes in an emphatic vocal chorus and crashing percussion. A very promising development that, if nothing else, provides another three and a half minutes of infectiously upbeat music to be absorbed by.
